articles.title: Galactic Rings of Power: Astronomers Uncover Massive Magnetic Toroids in the Milky Way Halo - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astrophysicists have discovered large magnetic toroids in the Milky Way's halo, which impact cosmic ray propagation and the physics of interstellar space. Their research, based on extensive Faraday rotation data, reveals that these toroids extend across the g…
articles.content: Magnetic fields in the halo of the Milky Way have a toroidal structure, extending in the radius range of 6000 light-years to 50,000 light-years from the Galaxy center. The Sun is at about 30,000 ligh… [+3754 chars]
